mapper.select: select name, position, deptname, profile_color, empno from ( select name, position, fk_deptno, PROFILE_COLOR, empno from TBL_EMPLOYEES where empno in (${str_empno}) ) join TBL_DEPT on fk_deptno = deptno order by fk_deptno, empno

select NAME, SUBSTR(NAME, -2, 2) as nickname , DEPTNAME, POSITION, PROFILE_COLOR, PK_MSGNO , empno, ORIGIN_MSGNO, SUBJECT, CONTENT, VIEW_STATUS , to_char(WRITEDATE , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss' ) as WRITEDATE , group_msgno, having_attach from ( select PK_MSGNO , FK_RECIPIENTNO, ORIGIN_MSGNO, SUBJECT, CONTENT, VIEW_STATUS, WRITEDATE, having_attach, group_msgno from tbl_messenger where PK_MSGNO = #{msgno} ) join ( select empno, NAME, DEPTNAME, POSITION, PROFILE_COLOR from TBL_EMPLOYEES M join TBL_DEPT D on M.fk_deptno = D.deptno
) on FK_RECIPIENTNO = empno order by WRITEDATE desc

select NAME, SUBSTR(NAME, -2, 2) as nickname , DEPTNAME, POSITION, PROFILE_COLOR, PK_MSGNO , empno, ORIGIN_MSGNO, SUBJECT, CONTENT, VIEW_STATUS , to_char(WRITEDATE , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss' ) as WRITEDATE , group_msgno, having_attach from ( select PK_MSGNO , FK_RECIPIENTNO, ORIGIN_MSGNO, SUBJECT, CONTENT, VIEW_STATUS, WRITEDATE, having_attach, group_msgno, fk_senderno from tbl_messenger where PK_MSGNO = #{msgno} ) join ( select empno, NAME, DEPTNAME, POSITION, PROFILE_COLOR from TBL_EMPLOYEES M join TBL_DEPT D on M.fk_deptno = D.deptno
) on fk_senderno = empno order by WRITEDATE desc
mapper.update: update tbl_messenger set VIEW_STATUS = 1 where PK_MSGNO in ( ${msgno} )
update tbl_messenger set VIEW_STATUS = 1 where FK_RECIPIENTNO = #{empno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_messenger_file (pk_fileno, fileName, orgFilename, fileSize, fk_msgno) values (seq_tbl_messenger_file_fileno.nextval, #{fileName}, #{orgFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{fk_msgno})
mapper.update: update tbl_messenger_file set fk_msgno = #{msgno} where fk_msgno = #{time}
mapper.select: select PK_ALARMNO, FK_RECIPIENTNO, URL, URL2, ALARM_CONTENT, ALARM_TYPE, func_get_alarm_time(WRITEDATE ) as WRITEDATE2 from tbl_alarm where FK_RECIPIENTNO = #{empno} and view_status = 0 order by WRITEDATE desc

select PK_ALARMNO, FK_RECIPIENTNO, URL, URL2, ALARM_CONTENT, ALARM_TYPE, func_get_alarm_time(WRITEDATE ) as WRITEDATE2 from tbl_alarm where FK_RECIPIENTNO = #{empno} and view_status = 1 and WRITEDATE > (sysdate -7) order by WRITEDATE desc
mapper.update: update tbl_alarm set view_status = 1 where pk_alarmno = #{alarmno}
update tbl_alarm set view_status = 1 where FK_RECIPIENTNO = #{empno} and view_status = 0
mapper.select: select pk_leave_type, leave_name, limit_info, add_file, emoji, limit_days ,case when LIMIT_DAYS>0 then LIMIT_DAYS - (select func_get_used_leave( PK_LEAVE_TYPE , ${empno}, ${year}) from dual) end as remaining_leave from tbl_leave

select PK_LEAVE_TYPE, LEAVE_NAME, LIMIT_INFO, ADD_FILE, EMOJI, info1, info2, info3, LIMIT_DAYS ,case when LIMIT_DAYS>0 then LIMIT_DAYS - (select func_get_used_leave( PK_LEAVE_TYPE , ${empno}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')) from dual) end as remaining_leave from tbl_leave where PK_LEAVE_TYPE = #{pk_leave_type}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_request_leave (pk_request_leaveno, fk_empno, fk_leave_type, start_day, end_day, use_days, use_reason, fileName, orgFilename) values (seq_tbl_request_leave.nextval, #{empno}, #{pk_leave_type}, to_date('${start_day}','yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date('${end_day}','yyyy-mm-dd'), (to_date('${end_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date('${start_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')+1), #{use_reason}, '${fileName}', '${originalFilename}')
mapper.update: update tbl_used_leave set ${pk_leave_type} = ${pk_leave_type} + (to_date('${end_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date('${start_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')+1) where pk_fk_empno = #{empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)

update tbl_used_leave set ${pk_leave_type} = ${pk_leave_type} + (to_date('${end_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date('${start_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')+1) , half_annual = half_annual + ((to_date('${end_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date('${start_day}','yyyy-mm-dd')+1)*2) where pk_fk_empno = #{empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)
update tbl_used_leave set annual = annual + 0.5 , half_annual = half_annual + 1 where pk_fk_empno = #{empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)
mapper.select: select pk_request_leaveno, fk_leave_type, to_char(start_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_day2, to_char(end_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_day2 , func_get_day(start_day) as start_name , func_get_day(end_day) as end_name , use_days, use_reason, opproval_status, add_file, filename, orgfilename, emoji, leave_name from tbl_request_leave R join tbl_leave L on FK_LEAVE_TYPE = PK_LEAVE_TYPE where fk_empno = #{empno} and to_char(START_DAY, 'yyyy')= #{year} and START_DAY < sysdate order by start_day desc

select pk_request_leaveno, fk_leave_type, to_char(start_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_day2, to_char(end_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_day2 , func_get_day(start_day) as start_name , func_get_day(end_day) as end_name , use_days, use_reason, opproval_status, add_file, filename, orgfilename, emoji, leave_name from tbl_request_leave R join tbl_leave L on FK_LEAVE_TYPE = PK_LEAVE_TYPE where fk_empno = #{empno} and to_char(START_DAY, 'yyyy')= #{year} and START_DAY > sysdate order by start_day asc

select pk_request_leaveno, fk_leave_type, to_char(start_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_day2, to_char(end_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_day2 , func_get_day(start_day) as start_name , func_get_day(end_day) as end_name , use_days, use_reason, opproval_status, add_file, filename, leave_name, orgfilename , fk_empno, name,substr(name, -2, 2) as nickname, position, profile_color from (select * from tbl_request_leave join TBL_EMPLOYEES on fk_empno = empno where pk_request_leaveno = #{request_leaveno} )R join tbl_leave L on FK_LEAVE_TYPE = PK_LEAVE_TYPE
mapper.update: update tbl_request_leave set filename = '${fileName}', orgFilename = '${originalFilename}' where pk_request_leaveno = #{pk_request_leaveno}
update tbl_used_leave set ${fk_leave_type} = ${fk_leave_type} - ${use_days} where pk_fk_empno = #{fk_empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)

update tbl_used_leave set ${fk_leave_type} = ${fk_leave_type} - ${use_days} , half_annual = half_annual - (${use_days}*2) where pk_fk_empno = #{fk_empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)
update tbl_used_leave set annual = annual - 0.5 , half_annual = half_annual - 1 where pk_fk_empno = #{fk_empno} and pk_used_year = SUBSTR('${start_day}', 1, 4)
update tbl_request_leave set opproval_status = #{approval_status} where pk_request_leaveno = #{pk_request_leaveno}
mapper.select: select V.deptno from (select deptno from TBL_DEPT start with deptno = #{fk_deptno} connect by NOCYCLE prior deptno = upper_deptno) V join TBL_DEPT_MAPPING M on V.deptno = M.fk_deptno

select pk_request_leaveno, fk_leave_type, to_char(start_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_day2, to_char(end_day,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_day2 , func_get_day(start_day) as start_name , func_get_day(end_day) as end_name , use_days, use_reason, opproval_status, add_file, filename, leave_name, orgfilename , fk_empno, name,substr(name, -2, 2) as nickname, position, profile_color from (select * from tbl_request_leave join TBL_EMPLOYEES on fk_empno = empno )R join tbl_leave L on FK_LEAVE_TYPE = PK_LEAVE_TYPE where fk_deptno in (${deptJoin}) and ABS(sysdate-start_day) < 100 and fk_empno != #{empno} order by opproval_status asc , pk_request_leaveno desc
